tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE community_resources (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  website VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE shelters (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  capacity INT,
  contact_info VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE food_banks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE shelters (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT,
  services_provided TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE support_services (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE food_banks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact VARCHAR(255),
    hours_of_operation VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE shelters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    contact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE support_services (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    contact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE referrals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    referred_to VARCHAR(255),
    reason TEXT,
    referral_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FoodBanks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Shelters (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE SupportServices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ServiceCategories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ServiceProviders (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  service_id INT NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL
)
